questions.question: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
questions.author: Woody
questions.details: Me and my fellow woodchuckenites were out and around the garden the other day and stumbled upon a pile of wood. We asked ourselves 'How much wood do you reckon you could chuck if you us woodchucks could chuc wood eh?'

comments.response: I think 50 woods. But I'm no wood chucking master.
